h2_title: Best Spirits to Use in Black Myth: Wukong
content: Unlike Transformations, you will share the same health bar with Spirits, so it's crucial to pull them out at the right time. Not sure which Spirits to equip? Here are some we consider to be the best spirits to use in Black Myth: Wukong.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Best_Spirits_to_Use.md', within the main section titled 'Best Spirits to Use', specifically from the subsection 'Best Spirits to Use in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
Unlike Transformations, you will share the same health bar with Spirits, so it's crucial to pull them out at the right time. Not sure which Spirits to equip? Here are some we consider to be the best spirits to use in Black Myth: Wukong.
